# newdata 0.0.0.9018

- Add `new_value.ordered()`.
- Replaced error() with chk::err()
- Switch to Rmarkdown for roxygen
- check R >= 3.6
- Removed dependency on magrittr.
- Edited news file.
- Added `new_value().hms`
- Replace deprecated tibble::as_data_frame() with tibble::as_tibble().
